title: Running out of ideas riot?
body: Is it just me, or are all of these gamemodes becoming the most boring thing ever? Nemesis draft, where all the super underpowered champions are played almost every single game. I mean, whats the point of the game mode if its practically the same thing over and over. Just... do what the fans want for once instead of taking it to the riot offices, for the love of god. U.R.F U.R.F.

replies.body: Their server systems are falling apart, they can't seem to keep the core skeleton running, so "fun" game modes are the least of their worries right now.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldDiamond1317,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=RsfFw9AB,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-02-16T01:59:39.613+0000)
>
> do what the fans want for once

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/summoners-rift/NdbkZwhE-new-game-mode-idea-reverse-pick
Yes, this mode was a fan request. No other gamemode has been more requested than U.R.F and they have yet to bring it back.
Which they have said they will, in due time. As an event it can't be more than once a year, so complaining before April is pretty nonsensical.
Who ever said that an event can't happen twice a year? Rain is an event. lol.
